name: Freed by Friendship
description:
After the events of Trapped by Success, Bob Richardson gave up his wealth to help people. This is the next step of his journey... into space. He and 4 friends are strong together, but when his friends are taken by an alien, he is left alone, weakened. Will you save Bob's friends and become strong again?

Controls:

WASD / Arrows - Movement

Left Mouse Button - Shoot (In direction you are facing)

This is our first top down game and our first shooter. Any feedback is appreciated. Good Luck and Enjoy!
